channel.title: [Solved] MacOS: Bulk saving of notes as text files
channel.description:
Hi everyone -- apologies if this an FAQ but I haven't found it.
Is there a Drafts action that will allow the bulk export of multiple drafts, each as a separate text file with title = first line of file (for my purposes they can all be exported to the same folder -- don't need to specify destinations separately)
Thanks
